title: India Convicts Antiquities Dealer Also Facing Charges in New York
description: The dealer, Subhash Kapoor, has been accused by U.S. authorities of being a major trafficker who sold stolen artifacts valued at more than $100 million.
dc:creator: Colin Moynihan and Tom Mashberg
media:credit: Amirtharaj Stephen for The New York Times
media:description: Subhash Kapoor being escorted to court by police officers in India in 2015. The former art dealer has been convicted on antiquities trafficking charges there after a lengthy legal process.
